# Quetion 1

## a
```{r}
rem <- read.table("Data/remission.txt", header = TRUE)   # columns: trt (A/B), stage, remit (0/1)

tab <- with(rem, table(trt, rem))
chisq.test(tab)


```
```{r}

## Equivalent logistic model
m0 <- glm(rem ~ trt, family = binomial, data = rem)
summary(m0)               # Wald p-value for trtB
confint(m0)               # 95 % CI for odds-ratio
exp(coef(m0))
```
